This website contains articles and references for documentation particular to the `yinarlingi` package, as well as general guides and tutorials for how to implement a similar setup for your own dictionary project.

## Sitemap

  * [Index](https://coedl.github.io/yinarlingi/index.html): introduction to the `yinarlingi` package
  * References
    + [Dictionary Structures](https://coedl.github.io/yinarlingi/articles/wlp-structures.html): lists of structures in the Warlpiri dictionary
    + [Tests, Views, & Helpers](https://coedl.github.io/yinarlingi/reference/index.html): lists of functions of the `yinarlingi` package
    + [Git Workflow Summary](https://coedl.github.io/yinarlingi/articles/wlp-git_summary.html): summarised reference guide to Git workflow
  * Articles
    + [Set Up (software & accounts)](https://coedl.github.io/yinarlingi/articles/wlp-setup.html): setting up a Git workflow
    + [Git Workflow Tutorial](https://coedl.github.io/yinarlingi/articles/wlp-git_workflow.html): working according to a Git workflow
    + [Git Problemsolving Tutorial](https://coedl.github.io/yinarlingi/articles/wlp-git_problemsolving.html): solving problems with Git
